title: Hijab row: SC notice to Karnataka govt
dec: The Supreme Court today issued a notice to Karnataka government on pleas challenging High Court verdict refusing to lift ban on hijab in educational institutions [...]

title: Dollar hits 20-year high as markets hunker down for higher rates for longer
dec: The US dollar climbed to a 20-year high against other major currencies on Monday after Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell signalled interest rates would be kept higher for longer to bring down soaring inflation [...]
